MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Chemistry | b: Biology | c: Physics | d: Geology

MCQ: Which theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular respiration | d: Mitosis

MCQ: What is the basic unit of life that all organisms are made up of?
Choices: a: Atoms | b: Molecules | c: Cells | d: Tissues

MCQ: Which process allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Photosynthesis | b: Respiration | c: Energy processing | d: Digestion

MCQ: What is the age of life on Earth estimated to be?
Choices: a: 1 billion years | b: 2.5 billion years | c: 3.7 billion years | d: 5 billion years
